duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare various documents including invoices, reports, memos, letters, and spreadsheets.
Read and analyze incoming memos, submissions, mail, and reports to determine significance and plan distribution.
Perform project work, file and retrieve documents, records, and reports.
Greet visitors, assess access, and perform general office duties such as ordering supplies and maintaining records management systems.
Prepare agendas and make arrangements for business meetings, as well as make travel arrangements for executives as requested.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED and 2 years experience in an office environment as an administrative assistant
